TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICommandService

Docs.summary: Represents a command interface that is used for integration of [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/add/includes/wfd1-md.md)] actions (for example, context menu), with custom-provided implementations, such as property browser service, debugging service, and so on.

Docs.summary: Executes the command with the specified command identifier and parameters.
